summary: Koninklijke Philips N.V., usually called Philips, is a Dutch company started in 1891 by Gerard and Frederik Philips to make light bulbs. Now, its headquarters are in Amsterdam, and it focuses on health technology. Philips used to make consumer electronics like electric shavers, audiocassettes, and compact discs. It's one of the biggest lighting manufacturers globally. The company is listed on the Amsterdam and New York stock exchanges and has over 80,000 employees in 100 countries. Philips also owns sports club PSV Eindhoven.
title: Philips
